page.title: 04INDUSTRY GARAGE 2
page.content: {GARAGES The other garage is{CHRIS.ROBINSONS and is called Cowling Service Station.It sells Globe Petrol,and also takes care of servicing cars.It does not sell new cars as an agency,but people can order new cars from the garage if they wish. The Robinson family have owned the garage for 19 years.Petrol is delivered from Burnley each week.One important part of the work is to recover crashed vehicles from all over North Yorkshire and Lancashire.Mr Robinson has large recovery vehicles which are called out by the police and rescue services. The price of their petrol is Â£2 per gallon.The garage opens at 7-0 a.m. and closes at 8-0 p.m.They employ 6 other people.The garage does not open on Sundays.
